Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Wallace/37th
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Wallace, Pershing, Halsted, 35th and Wallace, due to street blockage near Wallace/37th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wallace, Pershing, Halsted, 35th and Wallace, due to street blockage near Wallace/37th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

 

Please allow extra travel time
